pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mean Partition, Uncertainty Assessment, Cluster Validation and Visualization Selection for Cluster Analysis // Providing mean partition for ensemble clustering by optimal transport alignment(OTA), uncertainty measures for both partition-wise and cluster-wise assessment and multiple visualization functions to show uncertainty, for instance, membership heat map and plot of covering point set. A partition refers to an overall clustering result. Jia Li, Beomseok Seo, and Lin Lin (2019) doi:10.1002/sam.11418. Lixiang Zhang, Lin Lin, and Jia Li (2020) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btaa165.
